# Text.Layout.Line

**Structure**

A single line in a text layout: a collection of runs of placed glyphs.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Line
```

## Instance Properties

- **origin**: The origin of the line.
- **typographicBounds**: The typographic bounds of the line.

## Conforms To

- BidirectionalCollection
- Collection
- Equatable
- RandomAccessCollection
- Sequence

items.description: The typographic bounds of the line.
